service:
Web service que emite un saludo o una despedida
<messageReceiver mep="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/wsdl/in-out" class="org.apache.axis2.rpc.receivers.RPCMessageReceiver" />
<parameter name="ServiceClass">com.autentia.ws.servidor.Echo
<operation name="saludar" mep="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/wsdl/in-out" /> <operation name="despedir" mep="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/wsdl/in-out" />
